messages: eaa6e1da0eef72dfb27f73d1b6493b8f (10:14): what does it mean when I am trying to compile madwifi and I get enable wireless extensitions
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (10:15): you need the wireless extensions package
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (10:16): you can get them at the hair salon
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (10:17): apparently AMD half'd the pricing on their dualcore chips
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (10:17): time for a new server I think
60ef8eb03f7889973380e99d0248b673 (10:21): I haven't looked since I heard about the drop... interesting.. Might be time for a new desktop ;)
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (10:22): oh, you need the wireless shit in the kernel apparently.
8c8d357b5e872bbacd45197626bd5759 (10:22): you have to enable wireless extensions in the kernel.
eaa6e1da0eef72dfb27f73d1b6493b8f (10:23): how do I do dat?
60ef8eb03f7889973380e99d0248b673 (10:23): Properly, so it doesn't call you a failure again
eaa6e1da0eef72dfb27f73d1b6493b8f (10:30): where are the damn wireless extensions crap in the kernel config
60ef8eb03f7889973380e99d0248b673 (10:32): Wireless non-ham radio or somesuch... I haven't looked at them in ages
eaa6e1da0eef72dfb27f73d1b6493b8f (10:33): then what do I do after I do menuconfig
eaa6e1da0eef72dfb27f73d1b6493b8f (10:33): I enabled amature radio crap
eaa6e1da0eef72dfb27f73d1b6493b8f (10:34): where does kernel config go
60ef8eb03f7889973380e99d0248b673 (10:35): make && make modules_install && make install  .. that's what I use... ymmv, etc
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (10:36): jmc: you the same jmc that posted to alt.autos.dodge.trucks?
